title: http://www.cabinetoffice.gov.lk/cab/index.php?option=com_fabrik&c=form&view=form&Itemid=65&fabrik=11&rowid=6084&tableid=11⟨=en
decision_details: - The proposal made by Hon. John Amaratunga, the Minister of Public Order and Christian Affairs to sign a Memorandum of Understanding between the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka and the Romanian Government on releasing Diplomatic Passport holders from the obligation to obtain visa, with a view to further strengthening friendly relations between the Government of Sri Lanka and the Government of Romania, was approved by the Cabinet.
